EmailTemplate.name: DH AU Restaurant Suggestion
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Lead.Restaurant_Name__c} Registered
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Thank you for registering {!Lead.Restaurant_Name__c} with Delivery Hero. It's support like this that has allowed us to grow to a network of over 70,000 restaurants. One of our restaurant team will be in contact shortly to begin the onboarding process. We can't wait to spread the word to {!Lead.City}, until then - have a fantastic day!
